item.description:
Join us for our "Green Bag Lunch" - a series of get-togethers on Friday afternoons.

Each month will feature a different environmental topic and offer a way to get involved and make a difference. Bring your own lunch and beverage. We'll spend the first 15 minutes socializing, about 20 minutes hearing about the process, and the rest of the time working on specific action. Sponsored by the Sierra Club's Greater Boston Group. RSVPs welcome but not required. This is a free event and open to all.

For more information: Mary Ann Nelson 617-442-0123 or NelsonMASierra@aol.com

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bag Lunch Series - An Easy Way to Get Green!
